comments:
When I am trying to create a new project (File-New->Project), the default 
wizard shows "Next" button enabled and I get exception as "Unhandled event loop 
exception Reason: java.lang.NullPointerException". 

In previous version of Eclipse 3.0.1, the next buttin used to disabled on start 
up of the wizard

Thanks in advance
-Ashish

Ashish - I believe this has been fixed during 3.1 development.
Please reopen if you still see the problem.

From the stack trace it appears that some plug-in supplied a null image 
descriptor.  This in itself is a bug/problem with whatever plug-in's project 
was selected in the first page of the wizard.  However, JFace now checks for a 
null parameter and a default image is returned.
